data.title: Metro Bus & Rail
data.text:
Metro Rail surface shutdown

Church Street Station main platform closed for construction.

Starting July 12, Church Steet Station will be under construction until late 2025. Please use temporary platforms to board the rail. Click here and here for renderings of new station design.

Metro Rail Single Tracking

Single tracking between Fountain Plaza and Canalside Stations on the inbound (Canalside) track. Riders will be asked to transfer at Church Station. Passengers with mobility devices will need to board the first rail car.

Rail schedules can be found here.

Begining Thursday, April 18 Route 3 will be rerouted periodically due to construction.

Hampshire Street Construction â€“ Hampshire Street will be closed periodically between 15th and Lawrence Place. Details here.

Inbound: Inbound buses will turn right on Arkansas, left Herkimer, right Albany, left Normal, and continue regular route.

Outbound: Outbound buses will turn right on 15th St, left Massachusetts, left Lawrence, right Hampshire, and continue regular route.

West Avenue Construction - West Avenue will be closed periodically between Porter and Jersey. Inbound buses will be rerouted. Details here.

Inbound: Inbound buses will continue on Porter, turn right on Fargo, left on Jersey, right on West and continue regular route.
